welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sylvania, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toledo Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Toledo Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toledo Express Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Toledo Express Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lenawee County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lenawee County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available for free throughout the airport.
